projects.title: GroundedAI
projects.subtitle: Document-Grounded Q&A Platform with Verifiable Citations
projects.description: A production-grade, hallucination-resistant document intelligence platform that answers questions strictly from user-uploaded files using enforced **RAG** rules and **citation-level traceability**.
highlights: Architected and delivered a complete end-to-end **RAG pipeline** (ingestion → chunking → embeddings → retrieval → answer generation), enforcing strict grounding rules that explicitly refuse unsupported queries and eliminate hallucinations

Engineered **citation-first answering** with traceability down to document ID, chunk index, and page range, enabling verifiable, auditable AI responses suitable for enterprise and compliance-driven use cases
Built a scalable **multi-format ingestion framework** (PDF, DOCX, PPTX, TXT, CSV) with structure- and page-aware parsing to preserve semantic context during retrieval
Designed a production-ready **full-stack system** with a responsive React dashboard, secure workspace isolation, append-only chat audit logs, and cloud deployments on **Vercel** and **Render**

projects.title: TruNorth AI
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Career Navigation Platform
projects.description: A mobile-first, **AI-powered career navigation platform** that guides users through career clarity, decision-making, and actionable next steps using structured questionnaires, **conversational AI (text + voice)**, and personalized recommendations.
highlights: Architected and shipped an end-to-end **full-stack AI platform** using React + Vite and FastAPI, integrating PostgreSQL for structured data and **Pinecone** for semantic vector search to support scalable, real-world user workflows

Built a real-time **AI career coach** supporting both text and voice interactions using **OpenAI APIs**, **Whisper STT**, and **text-to-speech**, enabling seamless conversational guidance with low-latency responses

Designed and implemented **personalized career intelligence pipelines** combining multi-step questionnaires, conversational context, and AI reasoning to generate tailored career paths, strengths analysis, and recommendations
Developed a custom **AI confidence scoring engine** and **microsteps framework** (Explore, Reflect, Act) that converts AI insights into measurable progress and actionable user outcomes

projects.title: AI Job Assistant
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Resume Analysis & Job Matching Platform
projects.description: An AI-powered job assistance platform that analyzes resumes against job descriptions, generates ATS-friendly improvement insights, tracks applications, and provides personalized feedback through a modern full-stack web interface.
highlights: Designed and built a full-stack AI platform using **React + Vite**, **FastAPI**, and **MongoDB Atlas**, enabling scalable resume analysis, job tracking, and real-time AI feedback workflows
Integrated **Azure OpenAI (DeepSeek R1)** to generate contextual resume feedback, job-specific improvement suggestions, and keyword optimization aligned with ATS requirements
Developed an **ATS scoring engine** that evaluates resume–job fit using relevance scoring, skill frequency analysis, and readability heuristics to quantify match quality
Implemented **JWT-based authentication** with protected routes and secure session handling to support multi-user access and personalized dashboards

projects.title: Live Transcriber
projects.subtitle: Real-Time Audio Transcription Chrome Side Panel Extension
projects.description: A Chrome side-panel extension that performs real-time transcription from tab audio or microphone using streaming speech-to-text, with offline-first reliability, automatic failover, and interactive, exportable transcripts.
highlights: Engineered an **offline-first transcription pipeline** using **IndexedDB** with queued audio persistence, prioritized replay, and retry logic to prevent data loss during network interruptions
Integrated **Deepgram real-time WebSocket transcription** with an automatic fallback to **HTTP chunked uploads**, ensuring uninterrupted streaming across unstable connectivity conditions
Designed a **word-level deduplication and reordering buffer** to maintain correct chronological transcripts without repeated or out-of-order tokens
Built an **interactive transcript experience** with clickable timestamps that seek the source tab and support exports to **TXT**, **SRT**, and **JSON** formats

projects.title: Enhanced Weather Forecast Application
projects.subtitle: Responsive Weather Application with Advanced UI & Accessibility
projects.description: A responsive weather forecast web application that delivers real-time hourly and 5-day forecasts using the OpenWeatherMap API, enhanced with advanced UI components, improved accessibility, and mobile-first design principles.
highlights: Redesigned the application UI with **custom Bootstrap dialog modals**, replacing default alerts to significantly improve usability, accessibility, and visual consistency
Implemented **horizontally scrollable hourly and 5-day forecast views**, optimizing data readability and interaction across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
Integrated **OpenWeatherMap API** to fetch real-time weather data and structured forecast rendering logic for clean, maintainable state updates
Refactored JavaScript into **modular, reusable components** and applied mobile-first responsive layouts to improve scalability and long-term maintainability

projects.title: TasteTrails
projects.subtitle: Interactive Food & Travel Blog Platform
projects.description: A dynamic food and travel blog platform that enables users to create, explore, and interact with curated travel stories and culinary experiences through authenticated dashboards, social features, and scalable backend design.
highlights: Designed and implemented a **modular blog engine** with support for posts, likes, comments, and edits using **Node.js**, **Express**, and **MongoDB**, enabling rich user interaction and content management
Built responsive user-facing pages (Home, Create, Detail) using **EJS templates** with mobile-first layouts to ensure accessibility and usability across devices
Implemented **secure session-based authentication** using **express-session** and cookies, protecting user data while enabling personalized dashboards and workflows
Optimized RESTful routes and **MongoDB schema design** to support scalable blog operations with low-latency reads and writes

projects.title: Hadoop Distributed Computing Environment
projects.subtitle: Containerized Hadoop & MapReduce Framework with Docker
projects.description: A containerized Hadoop distributed computing environment built with Docker, enabling scalable big data processing using HDFS, YARN, and MapReduce for text analytics and log processing in a reproducible setup.
highlights: Architected a **Dockerized Hadoop environment** with automated cluster setup, enabling one-command initialization of **HDFS**, **YARN**, and MapReduce services for reproducible big data experimentation
Developed **MapReduce programs** for large-scale **n-gram frequency analysis** and **log processing**, demonstrating efficient distributed computation over high-volume text datasets
Configured a functional **single-node Hadoop cluster** with optimized HDFS storage and YARN resource management to simulate real-world distributed system workflows
Applied **distributed systems best practices** to optimize MapReduce performance and data handling, ensuring reliable execution across containerized nodes

projects.title: Blockchain-assisted Verifiable Cassandra
projects.subtitle: Tamper-Proof Distributed Database with Blockchain Verification
projects.description: A proof-of-concept system that integrates a distributed Cassandra database with blockchain-backed verification to ensure data integrity and authenticity for outsourced database services using cryptographic proofs.
highlights: Designed a **secure distributed system architecture** combining **Cassandra**, **Merkle Hash Trees**, and the **Ethereum blockchain** to enable cryptographic verification of queried data
Implemented **blockchain-backed integrity checks** by storing Merkle roots on Ethereum via smart contracts, ensuring immutable and decentralized verification guarantees
Built a **scalable NoSQL data layer** using Cassandra to support high availability and distributed storage while enabling verifiability of large datasets
Developed and tested **attack simulations** using benign and malicious client models to demonstrate detection of unauthorized data tampering

projects.title: Center for Comparative Archaeology – DBMS
projects.subtitle: Collaborative Research Database Management System
projects.description: A web-based Database Management System built to support global archaeological research by enabling secure access, contribution, and management of datasets through role-based workflows and a scalable backend.
highlights: Architected a **full-stack DBMS** using **Flask** and **MySQL**, designed to securely manage archaeological datasets while supporting concurrent access by global researchers
Built an **intuitive research-focused UI** with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, enabling users to browse, download, and contribute datasets with minimal friction
Implemented **role-based workflows** including guest access, authenticated researcher contributions, and moderator dashboards for dataset review and governance
Applied **database optimization and security best practices** to ensure data integrity, controlled access, and reliable system performance for research use cases

projects.title: Predictive Modeling for Paint Product Popularity
projects.subtitle: Machine Learning Models for Market Trend & Property Forecasting
projects.description: A machine learning project that predicts paint color popularity and physical properties using statistical and ensemble models, enabling data-driven insights for product planning and market strategy.
highlights: Developed and optimized **machine learning models** in **R** using **Random Forest**, **Gradient Boosting Machines (GBM)**, and **Logistic Regression** to forecast paint popularity and material properties
Performed in-depth **exploratory data analysis and feature engineering** to uncover patterns in consumer preferences and product characteristics
Achieved strong predictive performance with **RMSE of 0.011** and **ROC AUC of 0.897**, demonstrating high accuracy and reliable classification capability
Translated model outputs into **actionable business insights** that supported faster product development cycles and data-backed decision-making

projects.title: End-to-End Invoice Processing
projects.subtitle: AI-Driven RPA System for Automated Financial Operations
projects.description: An RPA and AI-driven system that automates the complete invoice processing workflow—from email ingestion to data extraction, verification, and delivery—significantly improving accuracy, speed, and fraud prevention in financial operations.
highlights: Designed and implemented a **fully automated invoice processing pipeline** using **UiPath** and **Python**, handling invoice ingestion directly from Gmail and eliminating manual intervention
Applied **machine learning–based data extraction and validation** techniques to achieve **99.8% accuracy**, dramatically reducing processing errors and fraud risk
Built robust **verification and exception-handling logic** to ensure data integrity across end-to-end financial workflows
Optimized operational throughput by **reducing manual effort and cycle time**, delivering measurable cost and efficiency gains for finance teams

projects.title: GRE University & Course Shortlisting Automation
projects.subtitle: RPA Solution for Automated University & Course Recommendations
projects.description: An RPA-driven automation that streamlines university and course shortlisting for prospective students by collecting academic profiles, scraping relevant education portals, and delivering personalized recommendations via automated reports.
highlights: Designed an **interactive form-based UI** using **UiPath** to capture student profiles including GRE scores, GPA, preferred countries, and courses, improving data accuracy and usability
Built **dynamic web scraping workflows** to extract university and course data from multiple education platforms based on user-defined criteria
Automated **data aggregation and reporting** by compiling shortlisted results into structured Excel outputs and emailing personalized reports directly to users

projects.title: Invoice Data Extraction Automation
projects.subtitle: RPA-Based PDF Invoice Data Extraction System
projects.description: An RPA solution that automates the extraction of structured data and tables from invoice PDFs received via email, using OCR and rule-based processing to streamline financial data handling.
highlights: Automated **email monitoring and PDF retrieval** using **UiPath**, filtering invoice emails based on subject rules and downloading attachments without manual intervention
Applied **OCR-based data extraction** and **string manipulation logic** to accurately capture invoice fields from semi-structured PDF documents
Implemented **Excel-based data organization workflows** to categorize, store, and prepare extracted invoice data for downstream financial analysis

projects.title: Download & Segregate Files from GitHub
projects.subtitle: RPA Automation for Intelligent File Downloading & Organization
projects.description: An RPA automation that downloads files from GitHub repositories and intelligently organizes them into structured folders based on filename patterns, improving file management efficiency and reducing manual overhead.
highlights: Built an **end-to-end UiPath automation** to navigate GitHub repositories, identify target files, and download them without manual intervention
Implemented **advanced string manipulation logic** to parse filenames and dynamically create folder structures for accurate file segregation
Designed a **scalable local storage organization system** that improves file discoverability and reduces errors in ongoing project workflows

projects.title: E-Commerce Data Scraping Automation
projects.subtitle: RPA System for Automated Product Data Extraction
projects.description: An RPA-driven automation that extracts product information from major e-commerce platforms based on user-defined criteria, enabling structured data collection for price comparison and market analysis.
highlights: Built an **end-to-end UiPath automation** that navigates Amazon and Flipkart, searches products based on user input, and extracts names, prices, and URLs without manual effort
Implemented a **user-driven execution flow** allowing dynamic platform selection and device-based searches, improving flexibility and reuse of the automation
Designed a **scalable data pipeline** that stores scraped outputs in structured Excel sheets and uploads them to orchestrator queues for downstream processing

projects.title: Food Billing System
projects.subtitle: Python GUI Application for Order Processing & Billing
projects.description: A Python-based GUI application that streamlines food ordering and billing by enabling item selection, quantity management, real-time total calculation, and automated receipt generation through an intuitive interface.
highlights: Built an **end-to-end billing application** using **Python** and **Tkinter**, enabling users to select food items, adjust quantities, and view real-time cost calculations
Implemented **dynamic order processing logic** to handle multiple item selections simultaneously while maintaining accurate pricing and total aggregation
Designed an **automated receipt generation system** that produces detailed bills with customer details, itemized purchases, and totals, supporting save, print, and email workflows

projects.title: License Plate Recognition & Detection
projects.subtitle: Machine Learning System for Vehicle Plate Identification
projects.description: A machine learning–based system that detects and recognizes vehicle license plates from images using image preprocessing, character segmentation, and classification to enable accurate vehicle identification.
highlights: Designed and implemented a **computer vision pipeline** using **Python**, **OpenCV**, and **NumPy** to preprocess vehicle images, enhance contrast, and isolate license plate regions
Applied **K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN)** for character-level classification, enabling accurate recognition of alphanumeric license plate characters
Optimized image processing and recognition logic to achieve robust performance across varying lighting conditions and viewing angles

projects.title: Automation for Setting Up Different Technologies
projects.subtitle: Infrastructure Automation Framework for Multi-Tech Stack Deployment
projects.description: An automation framework that streamlines the setup and configuration of complex technology stacks—including Docker, Hadoop, and multiple cloud service models—using Python and Ansible to reduce setup time and configuration errors.
highlights: Built **Python and Ansible–based automation** to provision and configure diverse technology stacks, significantly reducing manual setup effort and deployment complexity
Automated configuration of **Hadoop components** (job trackers, task trackers) and **Docker environments**, enabling rapid experimentation and consistent infrastructure initialization
Designed a **flexible, reusable automation framework** supporting multiple cloud service models (**CaaS, SaaS, PaaS, STaaS**), adaptable to both enterprise and educational use cases

projects.title: Face Recognition using Machine Learning
projects.subtitle: Real-Time Biometric Authentication System
projects.description: A machine learning–based face recognition system that authenticates users in real time using webcam input, leveraging computer vision techniques to enable secure, biometric-based access control.
highlights: Built a **real-time face recognition pipeline** using **Python** and **OpenCV**, training Haar Cascade classifiers to detect and recognize authorized user faces
Implemented **live webcam-based authentication**, enabling dynamic user verification and reducing reliance on traditional password-based security
Integrated the recognition system into a **secure website access workflow**, demonstrating practical application of biometric authentication in digital security
